name: Нажатие кнопки добавления в корзину несколько раз

browser = <selenium.webdriver.chrome.webdriver.WebDriver (session="623b2ea8261027eabb028d4e67ccc1f2")>, base_url = 'http://172.19.16.142/'

    @allure.title("Нажатие кнопки добавления в корзину несколько раз")
    def test_double_click_add(browser, base_url):
        NUMBER_OF_CLICKS = 3
        mp_actions = MainPage(browser)
        mp_actions.go_to_mainpage(base_url)
        add_to_cart = mp_actions.find_all_specified_elements(mp_actions.ADD_TO_CART)
        for i in range(NUMBER_OF_CLICKS):
            add_to_cart[0].click()
        raw_price = mp_actions.find_web_element(mp_actions.PRODUCT_PRICE).text
        price = raw_price.split("\n")[0]
        num_price = float(price[1::])
        calculated_total_price = "$" + str(NUMBER_OF_CLICKS * num_price)
        print(calculated_total_price)
        total_price = mp_actions.wait_web_element(mp_actions.CART_TOTAL).text.split(" - ")[1]
        print(f"Total price is {total_price}")
